title: Note taking
content: For 3rd sem cse how often should we bring laptops to college like everyday? How do people take notes, in laptops or ipads or traditional long ruled books ?

comments.body: Laptop/other devices for note-taking depends on your prof, so you cannot generalise. Some let you make notes on a laptop, while most might not. You can carry your laptop daily but you will probably only need it on certain days.
Yes, but make notes with pen and paper preferably as not all teachers allow u to open ur laptop apart from hands on sessions
Yea bring laptop everyday. You will always have some lab work or assignments. For notes I prefer using pen and paper because I find it to be much easier
